command: curl -fsS --retry 2 --connect-timeout 5 --max-time 20 --compressed -X POST -H "Authorization: Bearer $ZOOMINFO_TOKEN" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Accept: application/json" "https://api.zoominfo.com/company/search" --data '{"companyName":"Example","locationCountry":"United States","resultsPerPage":10}' -o zoominfo_company_search_example.json -w '{"service":"zoominfo_company_search","http_code":%{http_code},"url":"%{url_effective}"}\n' >> recon_t1597.log
explanation: Uses ZoomInfo's commercial API to search for a company profile with geographic constraints, minimizing noise and logging request outcomes.
rationale_steps: Leverage a reputable closed-source business intelligence provider (ZoomInfo).
Use OAuth bearer token stored in an environment variable.
Constrain search by name and country with small page size to limit output.
Save structured JSON response to a file.
Log HTTP status for consistent error handling.
